headline: Assessing W. R. Berkley (WRB) Valuation After Its Expanded Share Buyback Plan
summary: Buyback expansion puts W. R. Berkley (WRB) in focus W. R. Berkley (WRB) increased its remaining equity buyback authorization to 25,000,000 shares on January 8, 2026. This type of move can influence share supply and often attracts closer investor attention. See our latest analysis for W. R. Berkley. At a share price of $67.88, W. R. Berkley has had a 90 day share price return of 9.49% decline, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 17.13% suggests momentum has been stronger over a longer...
